name: Pulsar X2 Mini Wireless
description: Tournament-grade wireless mouse at just 52g. Features PAW3395 sensor, custom Kailh switches, and exceptional build quality. Designed by pro players for pro players.

reviews.review_text: 52g is insane. Feels like wireless levitation.
Mini size perfect for small to medium hands.
Clicks are bit stiff out of box but break in.
